snippet.title: Higurashi: When They Cry Promotional Game Trailer
snippet.description:
This is the trailer for the original MangaGamer release in 2009.

Get it here: http://www.mangagamer.com/detail.php?goods_type=1&product_code=10
Or buy the updated Steam version, with new sprites!: http://store.steampowered.com/app/310360/
